DOC.criteria: Physician diagnose asthma Age 1275 yr FEV1 > 70 % predict HIB response > 10 % No smoking last 6 mo < 10 pack yr No URI last 4 week No asthma exacerbation last 4 weks Able withhold SABA > 8 hr LABA > 24 hr Other lung disease Cardiac disease condition would preclude safe participation , theophylline leukotriene modifier
